title: Caprese Salad
short_description:
Caprese Salad is a simple and elegant Italian dish, layering fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze. 
• 3 large ripe tomatoes 
• 200g fresh mozzarella cheese 
• Fresh basil leaves 
• 2 tablespoons olive oil 
• Balsamic glaze 
• Salt and pepper to taste

steps.title: 1. Slice Ingredients
steps.description:
• Slice 3 large ripe tomatoes into even rounds. 
• Slice 200g of fresh mozzarella cheese into even rounds. 
• Wash and dry a handful of fresh basil leaves.

steps.title: 2. Assemble Salad
steps.description:
• Layer the tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a platter. 
• Add a basil leaf between each layer. 
• Drizzle with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and balsamic glaze. 
• Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
